name: Chrysalis (itch) (MGI)
description:
A loud noise wakes you up in the middle of the night.
You know Uncle Ross is working on a solution in the lab basement.
A solution that will cure little dezeray of her…. Affliction.

You the player grab a flashlight from the nightstand
and go see what happened.

Somethings wrong… You smell blood... You hear creaks and moans… Your Fight or Flight instincts kick in and you need to escape!

You know It takes two keys to enter or exit the mansion.
Find where they are and make your timely exit.

[Movement & Controlls]
[WASD] Movement, Arrow Keys for Panning the Camera
[E] To interact/Pickup objects [ESC] or [P] for Pausing the game.
